DOC.brief_summary: The purpose split-mouth clinical study evaluate clinical , radiographic histological outcome lateral window sinus augmentation bovine xenograft CPS putty bone substitute posterior maxillary site survival implant place site follow healing .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation Anorganic Bovine Bone Mineral Versus Calcium Phosphosilicate Alloplastic Bone Putty Direct Sinus Augmentation : Spilt-mouth Study
DOC.criteria: Adult patient noncontributory medical history present bilateral sinus lift surgery prior implant placement Patients agree participate study sign consent form More 8mm residual bone height implant site Subjects smoke 10 cigarette per day History acute sinus infection History prior maxillary sinus surgery ( CaldwellLuc , direct indirect sinus lift , etc ) Medications affect bone healing ( chronic steroid regimen , oral IV bisphosphonates , etc . ) Patients allergic bovine derivative Patients carrier transmissible disease ( ) may unnecessarily expose laboratory personnel risk Females pregnancy lactation females plan become pregnant following year ( pregnancy test prior enrollment )
